item.title: 莫迪大选后的预算向选民的经济担忧低头
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的新政府概述了在主要政治盟友所支持的失业和项目上的巨额开支，这是执政党在上个月的选举中遭受惩罚性挫折后，迄今为止对印度政治格局变化的最高调承认。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s new government outlined vast spending on unemployment and projects favored by key political allies, in the most high-profile acknowledgment to date by the ruling party of India’s changed political landscape following a punishing election setback last month.】

item.title: 富国银行聘请德意志银行的周负责管理技术并购团队
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. has hired Tom Cho as head of its team advising technology companies on mergers and acquisitions, according to a person familiar with the matter, as it continues to strengthen its corporate and investment bank.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构成立打击内幕交易小组
item.description: 澳大利亚证券监管机构将成立一个新的团队，专门负责内幕交易调查，加大力度打击市场操纵行为。【原文：Australia’s securities regulator will establish a new team dedicated to insider trading investigations as it ramps up efforts to crack down on market manipulation.】

item.title: 乌克兰与 GDP 挂钩的债务达到战争开始以来的最高水平
item.description: 在政府承诺偿还部分债务后，乌克兰的国内生产总值（GDP）指数回升至 2022 年初以来的最高点。【原文：Ukraine’s GDP warrants rallied to the highest since early 2022 after the government promised to make some of its debt payments.】

item.title: 欧洲最大电动汽车电池制造商因需求减少考虑开发新产品
item.description: 在电动汽车需求疲软的情况下，欧洲最大的电动汽车电池生产商可能会涉足为利用可再生能源的家庭建造储能设施。【原文：The biggest producer of batteries for electric vehicles in Europe may branch out to build energy storage facilities for households harnessing renewable energy, amid weak demand for e-cars.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利建议南非股票战胜现金和债券
item.description: 人民币摩根士丹利认为，由于预期降息和减少滚动停电支持盈利增长，南非股票的回报率将超过现金和债券。【原文：RMB Morgan Stanley sees South African equities delivering returns that will outperform those for cash and bonds as expected interest-rate cuts and reduced rolling blackouts support earnings growth.】

item.description:
自 6 月中旬以来，波罗的海港口的装运量下降了 41%

item.title: 尼日利亚再次上调关键利率以抑制通胀、稳定货币
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行提高了关键利率，以抑制通货膨胀并支撑该国受创的货币。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank raised its key interest rate to curb inflation and bolster the nation’s battered currency.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司正在研制下一代窄体发动机演示器
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）正在开发基于其超风扇（Ultrafan）技术的下一代窄体发动机演示机，这家发动机制造商正努力重返商用飞机行业的最大领域。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc is working on a demonstrator for a next-generation narrowbody engine based on its Ultrafan technology, as the engine maker seeks to get back into the biggest segment of the commercial airplane industry.】

item.title: 北海油价低廉凸显需求依然疲软
item.description: 北海原油对全球最重要石油基准的制定至关重要，而这批原油在亚洲的价格非常低，这表明买盘依然乏力。【原文：A cargo of North Sea crude that’s crucial to setting the world’s most important oil benchmark fetched a very low price in Asia, a sign that buying remains lackluster.】

item.title: 首次公开募股终于带来夏日热浪，55 亿美元交易即将启动
item.description: 本周，多达 55 亿美元的首次股票发行将推动美国首次公开募股，这可能是投资者在最近新股上市低迷时期一直渴望的开端。【原文：US initial public offerings should get a boost this week from as much as $5.5 billion in first-time equity issuance that could be the opening investors have been clamoring for during this latest new listings slump.】

item.title: 台风 "格美 "关闭台湾金融市场和办公室
item.description: 台风 "格美 "携强风暴雨逼近台湾，台北将停工、停课，岛内 2.4 万亿美元的股票市场也将暂停交易。【原文：Taipei will suspend work, classes and the island’s $2.4 trillion stock market as typhoon Gaemi approaches Taiwan with strong winds and heavy rain.】

item.title: 在安大略省教师的支持下，法国 OGF 寻求再融资
item.description: 法国殡仪馆运营商 OGF SA 正计划在所有者安大略省教师养老金计划委员会的帮助下进行债务再融资，该委员会已向 OGF SA 注资 1.5 亿欧元（1.63 亿美元），以说服投资者继续投资。【原文：OGF SA, a French operator of funeral homes, is planning to refinance its debt with help from owner Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan Board, which has put a €150 million ($163 million) equity injection on the table to convince investors to stay on board.】

item.title: 据说韩国 OCI 公司将考虑为马来西亚业务进行 3.2 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，OCI 控股有限公司正在考虑将其马来西亚多晶硅部门在吉隆坡证券交易所上市，以筹集多达 15 亿林吉特（约合 3.2 亿美元）的资金。【原文：OCI Holdings Co. is considering listing its Malaysian polysilicon unit on the Kuala Lumpur stock exchange to raise as much as 1.5 billion ringgit ($320 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 匈牙利因福林回升和通胀数据再次下调关键利率
item.description: 匈牙利央行延长了长达一年多的宽松周期，因为上个月的通胀率低于预期，福林兑欧元汇率升至 6 月初以来的最高水平。【原文：Hungary’s central bank extended its more than yearlong easing cycle after inflation came in lower than expected last month and the forint rallied to the highest level against the euro since early June.】

item.title: 购房焦虑症开始刺激加拿大房地产市场发展
item.description: 加拿大是七国集团中第一个降息的国家，这次降息启动了该国的房地产市场。【原文：Canada’s interest-rate cut — the first among Group of Seven economies — has jump-started the country’s housing market.】

item.title: 英国制裁俄罗斯后油轮保险赔付面临风险
item.description: 一家重要的保险提供商说，如果海上石油转运涉及一家最近获得批准的俄罗斯保险公司，一旦出现问题，西方公司可能无法支付索赔。【原文：Transfers of oil at sea that involve a recently-sanctioned Russian insurer may prevent western firms from paying claims if something goes wrong, a key provider of cover said.】

item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International Inc.【原文：Philip Morris International Inc. raised its forecast for annual profit growth on higher demand for its Zyn nicotine pouches, as enthusiasm for tobacco alternatives rages on.】

item.title: 淡水河谷任命矿业资深人士 Usmar 管理其基本金属部门
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）任命资深矿业高管肖恩-乌斯马尔（Shaun Usmar）掌管其基本金属部门，这家巴西矿业公司正努力提高铜和镍的产量。【原文：Vale SA has appointed veteran mining executive Shaun Usmar to take the helm of its base metals division, as the Brazilian miner seeks to boost copper and nickel production.】

item.title: 澳大利亚股东注销泰晤士水务股份
item.description: 据一位澳大利亚投资者称，泰晤士水务公司的股份现在一文不值。【原文：A stake in Thames Water is now worth nothing, according to one Australian investor.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市反弹，焦点转向利率决定
item.description: 发展中国家股市从 8 月份以来最长的连跌走势中反弹，投资者的焦点转向一系列央行利率决定。【原文：Developing-nation stocks bounced back from their longest losing streak since August, with investors’ focus turning to a raft of central bank interest-rate decisions.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在经历了上周以科技股为首的惨痛大跌之后，所谓的 "七巨头 "中的两家即将发布财报，卡马拉-哈里斯的总统竞选活动也在逐渐升温，摩根大通的新任投行主管们正在追逐市场份额。以下是您需要了解的信息— Morwenna Coniam.【原文：Good morning. Here’s what you need to know — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 纸巾需求疲软影响金佰利收益
item.description: Kleenex 纸巾的所有者金佰利公司（Kimberly-Clark Corp.【原文：Kimberly-Clark Corp., the owner of Kleenex tissues, reported quarterly sales that trailed estimates, indicating that shoppers are still moderating their spending despite cooling inflation rates.】

item.title: 印度联合利华利润低于预期，原因是消费者需求疲软
item.description: 印度斯坦联合利华有限公司（Hindustan Unilever Ltd.）公布的季度利润令人失望，原因是印度长达数周的全国大选导致消费需求持续疲软，以及通货膨胀率不断上升。【原文：Hindustan Unilever Ltd. posted an underwhelming quarterly profit weighed down by persistent weakness in consumer demand amid India’s weeks-long national elections and rising inflation.】

item.title: 私募股权投资发挥创意，为更多收益争取时间。客户说现在就付款
item.description: 私募股权投资公司正在利用一种金融工程技术，争取更多的时间从业绩不佳的投资项目中获取回报。他们最大的客户越来越多地说 "不，谢谢"。【原文：Private equity firms are using a form of financial engineering to buy more time for wringing returns from their under-achieving investments. Increasingly, their biggest clients are saying “no thanks.”】

item.title: 香港豪宅以 9,200 万美元售出，跻身今年最热门交易之列
item.description: 山顶一栋豪华住宅以 7.17 亿港元（9,200 万美元）的价格售出，成为今年最大的交易之一。【原文：A luxury residential home on the Peak has been sold for HK$717 million ($92 million), making it one of the biggest transactions this year.】

item.title: 巴克莱称，大跌后大科技股盈利诱人
item.description: 虽然投资者担心美国科技大盘股会持续下挫，但巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的策略师们表示，强劲的盈利前景意味着，在经历了最近的下跌之后，这批股票仍然具有吸引力。【原文：While investors are concerned about a sustained selloff in US technology mega-caps, Barclays Plc strategists say a robust earnings outlook means the cohort is still attractive after the recent rout.】

item.title: 全球最大招聘公司称客户对招聘信心不足
item.description: 全球最大的招聘公司 Randstad NV 表示，宏观经济的持续不确定性导致企业没有足够的信心就投资和招聘做出重大决策。【原文：Randstad NV, the world’s largest recruiter, says continued macroeconomic uncertainty has resulted in businesses not having enough confidence to make big decisions around investments and hiring.】

item.title: 土耳其航空公司的波音大订单因通用电气发动机谈判而搁浅
item.description: 土耳其航空公司订购 200 多架波音公司喷气机的计划因与发动机供应商通用电气公司在维护成本上的分歧而受阻。【原文：Turkish Airlines’ plan to order more than 200 Boeing Co. jets is being held up by differences with engine supplier General Electric Co. over maintenance costs.】
